channel.title: A Couple of Coding Questions
channel.description: Okay well I Just Made my New Server and im running it with the Downloaded Silab Client. and ive already Coded Some of the Server But these are some things i got Caught up on. I was hoping Someone Could Help me. Source-Naderz PK V2 ---Coding--- -Add Commands -Add Shops -Add Items To Shops -Changing Costs of ites in a Shop -Money Color Ex- 100m is Green Not Gold -Making TeleKenetic Grab Not Work -and Hitting Higher

Well i found it and Just added them in ill show you how i did it

} if(command.startsWith("zammygs") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(746, 1); } if(command.startsWith("armags") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(35, 1); } if(command.startsWith("sarags") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(2402, 1); } if(command.startsWith("bandosgs") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(667, 1); } if(command.startsWith("gsset") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(746, 1); addItem(667, 1); addItem(35, 1); addItem(2402, 1); }
and Nothing Worked

item.title: A Couple of Coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

if(command.startsWith("zammygs") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(746, 1); }

if(command.startsWith("armags") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(35, 1); }

if(command.startsWith("sarags") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(2402, 1); }

if(command.startsWith("bandosgs") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(667, 1); }

There, add all those commands under your customCommand String and then Moderators will be able to spawn them, or here is a command that will give you all godswords.

if(command.startsWith("gsset") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(746, 1); addItem(667, 1); addItem(35, 1); addItem(2402, 1); }

There is a tutorial on how to add shops, itl be within the first 3 pages in the tutorial section. As for your other 2 problems youll have to get further help, cause im not too sure, but i will keep trying to figure it out, and if i do ill report it to you asap.

Read full topic

item.title: A Couple of Coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Well i can answer almost all your questions, but it will be in a big post.

Commands.
There are like, 20 types of commands, ill give you the 2 most used ones.
AddItem command.
This command allows you, or your players to add a certain item with a certain amount with a command. Here it is.

if(command.startsWith("%%%%") && playerRights >= *){ addItem($$$, ###); addItem($$$, ###); addItem($$$, ###); }

Key
%%%% = Command name (what you type after :

  • = Player rights you want to be able to use this command
    $$$ = Item ID you want them to get

= Amount you want them to get

Next is a Teleport Command. It teleports you to certain coordinated you want.

if(command.startsWith("@@@@") && playerRights >= $){ triggerTele(****, %%%%, 0); }

Key
@@@@ = Command name (What you type after :
$ = Player rights you want to be able to use this command
**** = X Coordinate you want them to teleto
%%%% = Y Coordinate you want them to teleto

Next ill go with, Hitting Higher.

Simply just go into your Item.cfg and find your item you want to make hit harder. Beside it, youll see a bunch of numbers, Skip the first 2 bunches and across will be a bunch 0’s. Change the 0’s to whatever you want the stat to be. Strength bonus is usually the Second last one.

Ill post more soon, i have to leave. Ill be back to tell you more.

Read full topic

item.title: A Couple of Coding Questions
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“iTzNoLannn, post:1, topic:356782”]Okay well I Just Made my New Server and im running it with the Downloaded Silab Client. and ive already Coded Some of the Server But these are some things i got Caught up on. I was hoping Someone Could Help me.
Source-Naderz PK V2
—Coding—
-Add Commands
-Add Shops
-Add Items To Shops
-Changing Costs of ites in a Shop
-Money Color Ex- 100m is Green Not Gold
-Making TeleKenetic Grab Not Work
-and Hitting Higher[/quote]
what kind of commands? teleports?
changing item costs, go to item.cfg, next to the item name, there should be examine, then there should be 3 numbers, the 2nd one is the shop price,
money not sure
tele grab not work? for duping right? idk you could try making it so u need like 200 magic or something (since they probably cant get that) not sure about the magic but thats what i would think of doing because i dont know
hitting higher, go to item.cfg, next to those 3 numbers (how to change shop prices) next to those, there should be a bunch of numbers, those are the weapon stats, the first one is the first bonus it shows in game, like the first attack bonus, i think you can figure that on your own

Read full topic
